definition: not one thread loose (idiom); strictly according to the rules/meticulous/not one hair out of place
lit. not even one stroke is negligent (idiom)/fig. to write characters (calligraphy) in which every stroke is placed perfectly

sentences.english: But Moore's hair was not always done up.
sentences.chinese: 然而穆尔的头发并不总是梳得一丝不苟的。

sentences.english: However, Badigin is very precise and punctilious person.
sentences.chinese: 巴季金是一个非常精确和一丝不苟的人。

sentences.english: Barristers - always such sticklers for detail.
sentences.chinese: 律师们总是对细节一丝不苟。

sentences.english: Hanks so scrupulously, heroically mimes the wasting wought by the disease.
sentences.chinese: 汉克斯咬紧牙关，一丝不苟地模仿艾滋病造成的虚弱。

sentences.english: However, Badigin is very precise and punctilious person. Just seven kills.
sentences.chinese: 巴季金是一个非常精确和一丝不苟的人。

sentences.english: Billy is punctilious in the performance of his duties.
sentences.chinese: 毕利执行任务总是一丝不苟的。

sentences.english: He wiped his hands on his fatigue trousers with a slow thorough motion .
sentences.chinese: 他慢腾腾一丝不苟地把手在破裤子上擦了几擦。

sentences.english: Gradually, I became uncommunicative and reserved.
sentences.chinese: 渐渐地我变得孤僻，不苟言笑。

sentences.english: The boss is an unsmiling man.
sentences.chinese: 老板是个不苟言笑的人。

sentences.english: Which makes Carell, master of the awkward laugh, a perfect choice to play the lead.
sentences.chinese: 这给一向不苟言笑的卡瑞尔一个要扮演的完美的选择。

sentences.english: The unsmiling waiter gave me a blank look, so I strode off inside to search for it myself.
sentences.chinese: 不苟言笑的侍者茫然地看了我一眼。

sentences.english: Zunzhangshouji implement a standard strict in demands, not bad.
sentences.chinese: 遵章守纪一丝不苟，落实标准一点不差。

sentences.english: Zazen is meticulous work and details are important.
sentences.chinese: 坐禅需要一丝不苟，细节是关键。

sentences.english: There are many notes which indicate how scrupulous Jane is about facts.
sentences.chinese: 有许多短信可以表明，简对事实是一丝不苟的。

sentences.english: Both readers commend Knutson for his scrupulous attention to detail.
sentences.chinese: 两位读者都称赞克努森对细节一丝不苟。

sentences.english: In the production stage, Li Ying controlled the process by every step meticulously.
sentences.chinese: 在产品制作阶段，李影更加做到一丝不苟。

definition: not one thread loose (idiom); strictly according to the rules/meticulous/not one hair out of place
lit. one strong beat and one weak beats in a measure of music (two beats in the bar) (idiom); fig. follow a prescribed pattern to the letter/scrupulous attention to detail
conscientious/earnest/serious/to take seriously/to take to heart
to perfect sth that is already outstanding (idiom); constantly improving
not care about one's appearance (idiom)/slovenly in dress and manner
